titleStmt.title: The order and form for church government by bishops and the clergie of this kingdome. Voted in the House of Commons on Friday, July 16, 1641. : Whereunto is added Mr. Grimstons and Mr. Seldens arguments concerning Episcopacie.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.
Grimston, Harbottle, Sir, 1603-1685.
Selden, John, 1584-1654.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library, San Marino, California.
